tfwmdsInTextStepProps.name: items
tfwmdsInTextStepProps.description: Required. The list of text items to be displayed as steps. See items options below.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text string to use in the step. This will be ignored if contentHTML is set.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use in the step. This is not required if contentText is set.
